parameters.name: version_date
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Must be a base64-encoded string. The content of the document to ingest. The maximum supported file size is 50 megabytes. Files larger than 50 megabytes is rejected.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: If you are using the Data Crawler to upload your documents, you can test a document against the type of metadata that the Data Crawler might send. The maximum supported metadata file size is 1 MB. Metadata parts larger than 1 MB are rejected. Example:  ``` {   "Creator": "Johnny Appleseed",   "Subject": "Apples" } ```.
